snippet: A Tunisian court sentenced the men, ultraconservative Salafi Muslims, to five years in prison for attacking visitors to a Sufi shrine in Tunis.
lead_paragraph: A Tunisian court sentenced the men, ultraconservative Salafi Muslims, to five years in prison for attacking visitors to a Sufi shrine in Tunis.

headline.main: Six Men Sentenced for Attacking Sufi Shrine in Tunisia
